referenceObject.reference: Labarque, F. M. & Griswold, C. E. (2014). New ray spiders from Southeast Asia: the new Philippine genus Tagalogonia gen. nov. and continental genus Coddingtonia Miller, Griswold and Yin, 2009 (Araneae: Theridiosomatidae), with comments on their intergeneric relationships. In: Williams, G. C. & Gosliner, T. M. (eds.) The Coral Triangle: The 2011 Hearst Philippine Biodiversity Expedition. California Academy of Sciences, San Francisco, pp. 407-425.
